Description: Readable.io is a collection of tools for improving the quality of your writing.
Name: Readable.io

Methods.Name: Analyse Text
Methods.Description: Pass in plain text to be scored.

Methods.Name: Analyse URL
Methods.Description: Pass any URL to the site to score.

Methods.Name: Retrieve Highlighted Issues
Methods.Description: Retrieve highlighted issues from a piece of text scored within the last 6 hours.
